text: 3:2 Ua Me Ini 27:1Ezɨ Jehosadakɨn otarim Josua, ko ofa gamir gumazir igharaziba, ko Sealtielɨn otarim Serubabel uan adarazi ko, me bar uamategha Israelian God bagha ofa gamir dakozimɨn ingari. Kar, asɨziba tue da bar isia mɨghɨrir ofabagh amir dakozim. Fomɨra, Godɨn gumazim Moses Osirizir Arazim, me an gɨn ghua dakozir kamɨn ingari.
